title: Please Riot/IronStylus.  Fix that chin.  Please, I'm begging, don't ignore us :(
body:
Guess what?  It's another Ahri splash thread!  Yay!  As if we didn't have enough eh? 

So it looks like the updated 5.1 patch splash is here to stay.  Many people have voiced their disaproval, and ok Riot, I get it, you're not gonna change something every time you see a complaint.  People have different tastes, sure.  And if you were to react to every single little complain on the forums, you'd never be able to satisfy everyone.  

BUT I do feel there are some things that you'd have to be blind or insanely stubborn not to realize.  Like wukong's coloring the first time the new splash came out.  It was orange, OBVIOUSLY way off from the red that is wukong.   And indeed it was later fixed.  You know what else is also OBVIOUSLY way off?  Ahri's chin. 

http://i.imgur.com/QuaVMQu.png

 It's . . .sorry, but . . . it's ugly.  No other way to put it.  I think it's a huge part of the reason people complain that they don't find the new Ahri attractive.  It's passable when you look at the splash art as a whole, but when you focus in on the face, such as when you look at the character icon, you see this HUGE shadow/tumor underneath her lips.  Look at her character model, her skin models, her skin splashes.  NONE of them have that weird tumor chin.

This is what I'm proposing, very very simple fix.  

http://i.imgur.com/pb5Thdh.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/W5QXf7z.png

very subtle, just a simple reduce the size/prominence of that chin.  A lot of Asians have round/soft faces, and sure some have a pointed prominent chin, but it's not tumor looking.  You guys probably got fed up with all the complaints, thinking you'd never be able to please the fan base after you kept getting criticism even after already reworking her, but don't let that blind you from the fact that that chin is fugly.  Again, very simple fix - just soften the features.


tl:dr please Riot, fix Ahri's chin, it looks bad right now {{summoner:3}}  and it's a very very simple fix that I think would make everyone happy {{summoner:31}}  without upsetting really anyone .  Please don't ignore this thread like you do so many other amazing (and often highly upvoted) suggestions.

***edit*  I'm not an Ahri main/fan btw.  I'm a fan of good splash art.  And it looks like the big chin people are taking this too personally, point is the chin doesn't match her in game model-her skin models-her skin splashes-her concept art-her new dawn video model-her fanart.  Many things don't match but this actually affects the icon which you use in the boards/minimap/champion select etc.  It sticks out too much, the lighting/shading is too harsh.**

It's a perfectly normal chin and comparing it to a tumor is ignorant and insulting to people who actually suffered by it. 
Chins come in various shapes and sizes and there is nothing wrong with Ahris.

Insulting to people who have suffered from tumors or insulting to people who have suffered from that chin?  I don't get who I'm supposedly insulting.  Cause this chin looks like a tumor.  Don't see it?  You have to remember this is a piece of art - look at the brush strokes and curves and you'll see the problem.  I've provided a zoomed in version to illustrate my point.

http://i.imgur.com/rdX8hPx.jpg

You see that line that I've circled in the second pic?  It's the edge of the shadow from the fullness of the lip.  And if you notice, it fuses with the outline of the chin.  This is the problem.   It makes it so the end effect is the outline that I've drawn in the third pic.  Do you see how amorphous that outline is?  I've seen prominent chins in pictures/real life sure, but never something like that.  Only pictures I've seen of deformed chins like that are patients who are suffering from some sort of disease, lymphoma, elephantiasis, whatever.  And saying there's nothing wrong with a facial tumor - now THAT is ignorant.  We have chemotherapy and reconstructive facial surgery for that; nobody should have to live like that.  Now that really is besides the point, why should Ahri, who is a drawn character, have to look like that when NONE of her other art depictions look like that?  

**Chins come in various shapes and sizes - sure.  Now explain to me why the chin doesn't match her base in-game model, the in-game models of her skins, the splash arts of her skins.**

I think you are just not looking at it correctly or don't understand the shadowing. I understand how that might be a problem for someone who isn't an artist but let me tell you that her chin looks completely normal. Maybe not the same shape as her old one but still normal. I think what's throwing you of is the small patch of her hair on right jaw line. 
And please stop with these childish comparisons to tumors etc. It's clear to me you never saw or experienced it.

"Maybe not the same shape as her old one but still normal." -> It's not her chin, you just said it.  Why not fix it?  Simple as that.  

About this whole tumor comments, I've seen many tumors in my lifetime.  I've seen cancer too, and it sucks.  You're probably confusing tumor with cancer, and you've probably had a close relative who has had cancer, which is probably why you're getting all offended/taking it personal.  A tumor is not necessarily malignant, they can be benign.  It's a normal part of everyday language, people use tumor to refer to swollen or distended parts.  That's it. Anyways this is an art discussion, nothing more, you're getting too wrapped up on the terminology.

This is a very interesting post.  I'll say this.

 1. Don't make this personal.  I feel like you're a bit offended since you believe you have a similar chin (I believe you don't, see point 2), and your comment shows you're interpreting the goal of this thread incorrectly.  This isn't a "let's poke fun at people's physical imperfections thread".  This isn't a "every female character in lol needs to be perfectly hot thread, make her hotter" either.   This isn't a "I love ahri she needs to be perfect thread" either.  I'm not an Ahri main.  This is a "let's fix messed up art" thread.  Like I already said, NONE of her skins or models have this chin, so why would this splash have it?  It looks incredibly off.  Simple as that.  Everything has imperfections sure, perfect is the enemy of good, sure, but that doesn't excuse something that can EASILY be fixed.  This is digital art, not plastic surgery.  And it's a less than 5 minute fix.  There are many times there are things in art I might not agree with but I don't say anything and I just let myself get used to it.  But again, there's no reason NOT to change this. 

 2. I really don't see how you have a chin like this.  I've NEVER seen a chin like the one in Ahri's, I've seen prominent/pronounced chins before, especially in Southeastern asian women, but study the art closely and you'll see that if you were to rotate Ahri so you'd be looking at her from the front, she would have a SPHERICAL bulge that runs down from her lips.  So I really don't think your chin is like this.  You might have a pronounced chin, and there's nothing wrong with that, it might fit your face/demeanor/personality, I don't know, I don't know you.  But the current chin here doesn't fit Ahri's main icon.
